snippet: Detroit filled the bases in the bottom of the ninth Thursday, then received a game-winning hit to beat visiting Boston on opening day.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column on Detroit Tigers 3-2 win over Boston Red Sox in Tiger's home opener; notes that the Tigers are favorites to win World Series, and team is relishing the role.
lead_paragraph: Detroit filled the bases in the bottom of the ninth Thursday, then received a game-winning hit to beat visiting Boston on opening day.

headline.seo: Repeat for Red Sox; New Day in Detroit
headline.main: Repeat for Red Sox, Joyous Day for Detroit
headline.print_headline: A Repeat for the Red Sox; a Joyous Day for Detroit
